validation.rentalPeriodFromRequired: Rental period from date is required
validation.rentalPeriodToRequired: Rental period to date is required
validation.rentMustBeGreaterThanZero: Rent amount must be greater than 0
validation.rentalPeriodFromMustBeBeforeTo: Rental period "from" date must be before "to" date
validation.electricityEndMeterMustBeGreaterOrEqual: Electricity end meter must be greater than or equal to start meter
validation.waterEndMeterMustBeGreaterOrEqual: Water end meter must be greater than or equal to start meter

validation.networkError: Network error: Unable to create bill. Please check your connection and try again.
